Name: Andromeda Zombies Colonies
About the game: Andromeda Zombies Colonies is an First Person Shooter video game featuring zombies. You awaken near a station on a red planet but an experiment turn wrong and now, hostile aliens have invaded the colonies, and they target you. You must survive using the weapons at your disposal. - 1 map, 9 weapons, 100 zombies
